post:
Guys Subnetweb Technology, yet another P2V [make posts to get vps] has started giveaways of awesome quality and secured provider Softlayer. The giveaway has been started some days ago and Yes its legit and its really great to get free VPS. 

**Here are the VPS's on the giveaway :**

**_Small-2 VPS:_**

Availabe : 20nos

Disk: 20GB HDD

RAM: 265MB

Burst RAM: 512MB

Virtualization: OpenVZ

ControlPanel: SolusVM

Bandwidth: 512GB

Location: The Netherlands, Amsterdam.


**_Mega-2 VPS:_**

Available: No

Disk: 50GB HDD

RAM: 768MB

Burst RAM: 1024MB

Virtualization: OpenVZ

ControlPanel: SolusVM

Bandwidth: 1024GB

Location: The Netherlands, Amsterdam.


You must have 50posts to eligible for Small-2 VPS which is currently available and its obvious you have to contribute some knowledge.


[here is the link](http://subnetweb.me/showthread.php?tid=604) to this offer.


Also they are planning to provide more VPS's when the available one's will be taken. Whats more we shouldn't expect more than this for FREE :D
